title_en: All Creatures of Our God and King
title_es: Todas las criaturas de nuestro Dios y Rey
lyrics_en: All creatures of our God and King, lift up your voice and with us sing, Alleluia, Alleluia! Thou burning sun with golden beam, thou silver moon with softer gleam! O praise Him! O praise Him! Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
lyrics_es: Todas las criaturas de nuestro Dios y Rey, eleven su voz y con nosotros canten, ¡Aleluya, Aleluya! ¡Tú, sol ardiente con rayo dorado, tú, luna plateada con brillo más suave! ¡Oh, alábenlo! ¡Oh, alábenlo! ¡Aleluya, Aleluya, Aleluya!
chords_en: (C)All creatures of our (G)God and (C)King, lift (F)up your (C)voice and (G)with us (C)sing, (F)Alle(C)luia, (G)Alle(C)luia! (C)Thou burning (G)sun with (C)golden (F)beam, thou (C)silver (G)moon with (C)softer (F)gleam! O (C)praise (G)Him! O (C)praise (F)Him! (C)Alle(G)luia, (C)Alle(F)luia, (C)Alle(G)luia!
chords_es: (C)Todas las criaturas de nuestro (G)Dios y (C)Rey, (F)eleven su (C)voz y (G)con nosotros (C)canten, (F)Ale(C)luya, (G)Ale(C)luya! (C)Tú, sol (G)ardiente con (C)rayo (F)dorado, tú, (C)luna (G)plateada con (C)brillo (F)más suave! ¡Oh, (C)alábenlo! ¡Oh, (C)alábenlo! (F)Ale(C)luia, (G)Ale(C)luia, (F)Ale(C)luia!

lyrics_en: Amazing grace! How sweet the sound that saved a wretch like me! I once was lost, but now am found; was blind, but now I see.
lyrics_es: ¡Gracia asombrosa! ¡Qué dulce el sonido que salvó a un desdichado como yo! Una vez estuve perdido, pero ahora me he encontrado; estaba ciego, pero ahora veo.
chords_en: (G)Amazing grace! How (C)sweet the (G)sound that (D)saved a (G)wretch like (C)me! I (G)once was (C)lost, but (G)now am (D)found; was (G)blind, but (C)now I (G)see.
chords_es: (G)¡Gracia asombrosa! ¡Qué (C)dulce el (G)sonido que (D)salvó a un (G)desdichado como (C)yo! Una (G)vez estuve (C)perdido, pero (G)ahora me he (D)encontrado; estaba (G)ciego, pero (C)ahora (G)veo.

title_en: Holy God, We Praise Thy Name
lyrics_en: Holy God, we praise Thy Name! Lord of all, we bow before Thee! All on earth Thy scepter claim, all in Heaven above adore Thee. Infinite Thy vast domain, everlasting is Thy reign.
lyrics_es: Santo Dios, ¡alabamos tu nombre! ¡Señor de todo, nos inclinamos ante ti! Todos en la tierra reclaman tu cetro, todos en el cielo te adoran. Infinito es tu vasto dominio, eterno es tu reinado.
chords_en: (D)Holy God, we (A)praise Thy (D)Name! (G)Lord of (D)all, we (A)bow be(D)fore Thee! (D)All on (A)earth Thy (D)scepter (G)claim, (D)all in (A)Heaven a(D)bove a(G)dore (D)Thee. (D)Infinite Thy (A)vast do(D)main, (G)ever(D)lasting (A)is Thy (D)reign.
chords_es: (D)Santo Dios, (A)¡alabamos tu (D)nombre! (G)¡Señor de (D)todo, nos (A)inclinamos (D)ante ti! (D)Todos en (A)la tierra (D)reclaman tu (G)cetro, (D)todos en (A)el cielo (D)te (G)adoran. (D)Infinito es (A)tu vasto (D)dominio, (G)eterno (D)es tu (A)reinado.
